name: Illusion
description: Masters of trickery who weave convincing falsehoods.

2.name: Illusion Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an illusion spell into your spellbook is halved.

2.name: Improved Minor Illusion
2.description: You learn the minor illusion cantrip, and when you cast it you can create both sound and image with a single casting.

6.name: Malleable Illusions
6.description: When you cast an illusion spell with a duration of 1 minute or longer, you can use your action to change the illusion's nature within the spell's normal parameters.

10.name: Illusory Self
10.description: As a reaction when a creature makes an attack roll against you, create an illusory duplicate that causes the attack to miss. Usable once per short or long rest.

14.name: Illusory Reality
14.description: When you cast an illusion spell of 1st level or higher, you can make one inanimate, nonmagical object in the illusion real for 1 minute. The object can't deal damage or harm anyone.
